name: Don't Drown (AnEmortalKid)
description:
Don't drown is currently in development

The current version available is Demo-0.1.0

Don't Drown is a 2D traversal underwater themed game. It has platformer style mechanics. 
The objective of the game is to gather the treasures found in each level.

Feel free to leave feedback for version 0.1.0 on this form: https://forms.gle/qKkAsmVzTtJMPr3R9

Unsigned Binary - At the moment, the initial binary is unsigned so you'll have to let windows run it.
